entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Declare the windows.protocol usage of the protocol/scheme `https` in your AppxManifest.xml file" #16172
  • DispatcherTimer reports itself as running after firing when IsRepeating is false #16171
  • Allow MAUI shapes to be used as an ImageSource #16170
  • Designer extensibility for third-party controls #16169
  • .NET 8 Preview 6 Android target #16166
  • BlazorWebView&WebView Unable to load on the windows11 system, the program crashes directly #16161
  • Datepicker in collectionview header shifts content down when opened on iOS #16160
  • Android splashscreen SVG not shown #16159
  • CarouselView does not update on first mouse click else works fine #16157
  • invalid android:versionCode - Android app doesn't build in default .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid app #16155
  • Include Map xml namespace by default on .NET 8 too, on NET 7 it works without any explicit definition #16154

Closed

  • WinUI Shell does not consistently react to shell structure changes #7171
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Exception thrown: 'Microsoft.Maui.Platform.HandlerNotFoundException' in Microsoft.Maui.dll #8988
    Backlog
  • [Bug] .NET MAUI RC1 - Shell - OnDisappearing not executing and OnAppearing is only executed the first time #6226
    Backlog
  • Image only Aspect fill #16076
    Backlog
  • EFCore Migrations Not Supported By Maui Class Libraries #16140
  • Building for Android fails because iOS SDK is missing #16146
  • Multiple Collection Views don't display correctly with visual studio for Mac compiled for Mac Catalyst. #10943
    Backlog
  • MAUI Android | Carousel in the page is being stretched in landscape mode #14989
  • Slider MinimumTrackColor has no effect on Windows #16056
    Backlog
  • Android Crash ImageSource Glyph #12513
    Backlog
  • Scrollview pushes button below beyond the screen on iOS #16051
    Backlog
  • Unable to publish and generate ipa file in .net 8.0 preview 5 #15973

PullRequests

Created

  • Stop DispatcherTimer after Tick fires if IsRepeating is false #16173
  • Bump powershell from 7.3.5 to 7.3.6 #16167
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix issue setting CarouselView position on Ctor or Appearing #16165
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image
  • [Android] Fix Keyboard.Numeric issue on DisplayPromptAsync #16163
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, area/keyboard
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix issue loading images from Stream #16162
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-image

Merged

  • Various fixes for Border on Android #15458
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [Windows] Fix Slider MinimumTrackColor (#16056) #16057
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-slider

Updated

  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • [controls] fix memory leak with Grid Row/ColumnDefinitions #16145
    layout-grid, memory-leak 💦
  • Prevent Android timer from adding multiple callbacks #16078
  • Text needs to be set before other properties #16116
  • Prevent refresh command from executing when CanExecute is false #16090
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #16113
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • OOTB Templates Building for Linux #16143
    area/templates 📄
  • [WIN] Add Switch.ShowStatusLabel Platform-Specific #16147
    t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Reduce Confusion of DateSelected Event in DatePicker (Split Into DateSelected and DateChanged) #16153
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker
  • Bump the aspnetcore group with 7 updates #16114
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures
  • Windows (packaged) Device tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing
  • [iOS] Fix WordWrap not working when Padding is set on Label #16136
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16033
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
